<meta name="keywords" content="api management, APIs, analytics, predictive analytics" />
<meta name="abstract" content="Apigee is a unified API management and predictive analytics platform that helps enterprises create and operate APIs and apps. Apigee Edge helps enterprises launch API programs fast, onboard partners and developers at low cost, and participate fully in a digital ecosystem. Apigee Insights provides big data predictive analytics with time-based graph processing that enables enterprises to deliver API-powered adaptive apps that anticipate and adapt to the needs of individual customers." />

<meta name="description" content="Apigee is an API management and predictive analytics platform that helps enterprises create and operate APIs and apps. Apigee helps enterprises launch and operate APIs, onboard partners and developers, deliver API-powered adaptive apps with predictive analytics , and participate fully in a digital ecosystems." />

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-homepage-slide-button">        <div class="field-content"><a href="http://apigee.com/about/products/apis-and-edge">Learn more</a></div>  </div>      </div>
          <div class="item ">

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-still-image">        <div class="field-content"><a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-apis-for-dummies-a-b-reg.html?utm_source=hpb-gray&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=dummies"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/9bvN8qTi4OJvhi8DEJUJOzIcFv-458IFEKxu1X700V0/mtime:1414773406/sites/mktg-new/files/API-DummiesCarousel_1140x475.jpg" width="1140" height="475" alt="APIs are the foundation on which digital businesses are built. Learn about the strategic significance of APIs." title="APIs for Dummies" /></a></div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-homepage-slide-text">        <div class="field-content"><p>Go beyond the acronym to understand the strategic significance of APIs that help transform your business and enable you to compete in the digital economy.</p>
</div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-homepage-slide-button">        <div class="field-content"><a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-apis-for-dummies-a-b-reg.html?utm_source=hpb-gray&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=dummies">Read APIs for Dummies</a></div>  </div>      </div>
          <div class="item ">

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-still-image">        <div class="field-content"><a href="/about/customer-story/walgreens-putting-api-around-their-stores"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/FOtBH54hulgp3W3ady0kggtHvIFHRUy6KWO_UxbmIYo/mtime:1411157062/sites/mktg-new/files/HP-walgreens-banner.jpg" width="1140" height="475" alt="Walgreens puts an API around its stores with Apigee" title="Walgreens puts an API around its stores " /></a></div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-homepage-slide-text">        <div class="field-content"><p>Apigee is the leading platform for digital acceleration, enabling companies to operate with the speed, scale, and agility required of digital business.</p>
</div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-homepage-slide-button">        <div class="field-content"><a href="http://apigee.com/about/customer-story/walgreens-putting-api-around-their-stores">Learn more</a></div>  </div>      </div>
          <div class="item ">

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-still-image">        <div class="field-content"><a href="/about/customer-story/live-nation-accelerating-event-ticketing-innovation-apis"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/wYSsFtZcCFt8LC2QgKyfhPi9R11lcVnU5XEoTjOq5V0/mtime:1414198984/sites/mktg-new/files/Live_nation-v2.jpg" width="1140" height="475" alt="Livenation and Apigee" title="Livenation and Apigee" /></a></div>  </div>

<section id="block-views-product-overview-block" class="block block-views clearfix">


  <div class="view view-product-overview view-id-product_overview view-display-id-block view-dom-id-b22a2ff40b8b4dadbea7f4ed78e6a5db">
            <div class="view-header">
      <h1 class="text-center homepage">The Digital Business Platform</h1>
<h2 class="text-center"><strong>Achieve digital acceleration</strong></h2>
<h3 class="text-center" style="margin-top: -10px;">with the speed, scale, and agility required to succeed in today's mobile-first digital world</h3>
<p></p>    </div>



      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">


<div  about="/about/block/api-management" typeof="" class="entity entity-bean bean-product-overview view-mode-product_overview_a">
    <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-6 ">
      <div class="field field-name-field-productoffering-icon field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/Z12LJ9ntPFmuomX7UW811nafl-jSi16uF_tPQVxYRC8/mtime:1404170951/sites/mktg-new/files/apis_round_icon_0.png" width="87" height="87" alt="Apigee is the leading platform for digital acceleration, powering companies that operate with the speed, scale, and agility required of digital business." title="APIs " /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-productoffering-headline field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Edge - API digital business platform</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-text field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Mobile devices and apps have changed the way customers connect with every business. To be relevant and compete, businesses must become digital and choose a technology platform capable of reaching new levels of scale, insight, and agility. </p>
<p>Apigee Edge is purpose-built for digital business and extends across the digital value chain to help organizations launch API programs fast, onboard partners and developers at low cost, and participate fully in a digital ecosystem.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://apigee.com/about/products/apis-and-edge">Learn more</a></div></div></div>    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-6 ">
      <div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/zAfVsFQ9pFehAsA972MdFFGKZt_E1jBHoBZ32wW9tLk/mtime:1404172141/sites/mktg-new/files/HP-dashboard-1-07.png" width="405" height="350" alt="Apigee is the leading platform for digital acceleration, powering companies that operate with the speed, scale, and agility required of digital business." title="Apigee API management" /></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<!-- Needed to activate display suite support on forms -->
  </div>
    </div>






</div>

<section id="block-views-product-overview-block-1" class="block block-views clearfix">


  <div class="view view-product-overview view-id-product_overview view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-80f23bf32ddb21f54a8af988ec1b003c">



      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">


<div  about="/about/block/big-data-analytics" typeof="" class="entity entity-bean bean-product-overview view-mode-product_overview_b">
    <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-6 ">
      <div class="field field-name-field-productoffering-icon field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/U0B5EOYAts1GKYM4hT2sEZVMdn5pmGnV73pou72oW9M/mtime:1404171175/sites/mktg-new/files/bi_data_round_icon.png" width="87" height="87" alt="Apigee is the leading platform for digital acceleration, powering companies that operate with the speed, scale, and agility required of digital business." title="Apigee Insights" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/IXH1HtKDqLbdmaQ39iO94QTue6fmcOiPtUEHMc5FVKk/mtime:1404172888/sites/mktg-new/files/analytics-v2-07.png" width="810" height="700" alt="Apigee Insights" title="Apigee Insights" /></div></div></div>    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-6 ">
      <div class="field field-name-field-productoffering-headline field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Insights - big data predictive analytics</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-text field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The intelligence from the massive amount of data generated by increasingly connected customers is proving critical to understanding user engagement and for optimizing experience across multiple channels. </p>
<p>Apigee Insights provides big data predictive analytics with time-based graph processing that enables enterprises to deliver API-powered adaptive apps that anticipate and adapt to the needs of individual customers.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field--productoffering-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://apigee.com/about/products/insights">Learn more</a></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<section id="block-views-home-page-ctas-block-1" class="block block-views clearfix">


  <div class="view view-home-page-ctas view-id-home_page_ctas view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-a892e2641a4cbb73f253d116468d7673">



      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-cta-read-more-link cta_column">        <div class="field-content"><h3>APIs for Dummies</h3>
This book demystifies APIs, going beyond the acronym to help you understand their strategic significance, as well as providing insight into how they can help your business.
<a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-apis-for-dummies-a-b-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=dummies">Get your free copy</a></div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-cta-button cta_column">        <div class="field-content"><a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-apis-for-dummies-a-b-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=dummies"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/cvzNaGFtqgCfK6xztIuG8LgFtW825X3vSotLShD2Z34/mtime:1406497798/sites/mktg-new/files/APIs%20for%20Dummies_0.png" width="147" height="190" alt="" /></a>
<p> </p>
<a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-apis-for-dummies-a-b-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=dummies" target="_blank">Get eBook</a></div>  </div>  </div>
    </div>






</div>
</section> <!-- /.block -->
<section id="block-views-home-page-ctas-block-2" class="block block-views clearfix">


  <div class="view view-home-page-ctas view-id-home_page_ctas view-display-id-block_2 view-dom-id-e4fd505815a30e836a6cc2f84a27feef">



      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">

  <div class="views-field views-field-field-cta-read-more-link cta_column">        <div class="field-content"><h3>Resources</h3>
Getting in Shape for the Digital World! Download the resources you need to accelerate your business. Learn about best practices with ebooks and webcasts.
<a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-digital-transformation-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=digital-transformation">GET Digital Ready</a></div>  </div>
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-cta-button cta_column">        <div class="field-content"><a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-digital-transformation-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=digital-transformation"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="//d38wlcdzwz02m5.cloudfront.net/about/cdn/farfuture/x6OYTFF2_AhY7sT6C7q8eX4fr0cpyk_kfJbd1aR6ic0/mtime:1402411493/sites/mktg-new/files/Digital_transformation.png" width="150" height="199" alt="" /></a>
<p> </p>
<a href="https://pages.apigee.com/ebook-digital-transformation-reg.html?utm_source=events-right-rail&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=ebook&amp;utm_content=digital-transformation" target="_blank">Get eBook</a></div>  </div>  </div>
    </div>






</div>
</section> <!-- /.block -->

          <h3 class="customer-cta-title">Next Steps</h3>
